credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Design for Embroidery of Overskirt, for Fabrique de St. Ruf
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
description: Vertical rectangle.  A bunch composed of poppies and other blossoms and ears of grain is shown in the wedge.  Plants of poppies and cornflowers alternate among the hem, small plants grow in the intervals.  A row of beads and a ribbon form the hem.  Reverse:  rough sketch of the bunch of flowers.
name: Drawing
